original_text: Then David said to Abishai and to all his officers, ‘My own son is trying to kill me. Now this man from Benjamin's tribe wants to do the same thing. The Lord has told him to do this, so do not stop him cursing me.
korean_text: 또 다윗이 아비새와 모든 신하들에게 이르되 내 몸에서 난 아들도 내 생명을 해하려 하거든 하물며 이 베냐민 사람이랴 여호와께서 그에게 명령하신 것이니 그가 저주하게 버려두라

sentences.original_text: 'My own son is trying to kill me.'
Now this man from Benjamin's tribe
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 베냐민 지파에서 온 이 사람도

sentences.original_text: wants to do the same thing.
The Lord has told him to do this,
so do not stop him cursing me.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 그가 나를 저주하는 것을 막지 마십시오.'
